description: This table contains information regarding Continued Care and Services Coordination, where each row represents a service considered for the patient's care. All services populated in a Continued Care and Services Coordination navigator section will be included in the table. The services can be user (SER), facility (EAF), or department (DEP) records.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: Provider/Resource (SER) ID of service being considered for Continued Care and Services Coordination.

columns.name: PROV_ADDR_ID
columns.description: Unique Address ID for the address in the provider/resource (SER) record that has been selected in a Continued Care and Services Coordination navigator section. A provider/resource (SER) record can have more than one address, and each address can be selected in a Continued Care and Services Coordination navigator section.

columns.name: DP_FAC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the request status for this service for this patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Accepted


Declined


Pending - No Request Sent


Pending - Request Sent


Removed


Considering


Processing

columns.name: STATUS_DTTM
columns.description: Instant when the Continued Care and Services Coordination request status for this service was last updated for the specific patient.

columns.name: DEST_BOOL
columns.description: This indicates whether a service has been selected as a caregiver for the patient. A service is defined as a caregiver service if it's included in the list on the Case Management - Caregiver Services screen in System Definitions.

columns.name: DEST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the patient's selected caregiver flag for this service was last updated.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The ID of the service provider being considered for Continued Care and Services Coordination (post-discharge services or placement for the patient) for this row. This column is populated for all service providers that are location (EAF) type records.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique department ID of the service being considered for Continued Care and Services Coordination for this row. If this column is populated, the service in this row is a department (DEP) record.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: This item is the note ID of a note record containing user comments about the related service in a Continued Care and Services Coordination navigator section for the given patient encounter.

columns.name: COORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coordination type for Continued Care and Services Coordination.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Destination


Durable Medical Equipment


Dialysis/Infusion


Home Medical Care


Community Resources

columns.name: SELECTED_SERVICE_BOOL
columns.description: Set to 1 if this service is marked as a patient's selected service, 0 otherwise.

columns.name: ARCHIVE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant a request or selected service for Continued Care and Services Coordination is archived.

columns.name: ARCHIVE_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who archives the request or selected service for Continued Care and Services Coordination.

columns.name: ENC_LOC_HAS_FIN_INTEREST_YN
columns.description:
Records whether the patient's encounter location had a disclosable financial interest in this service provider at the time this service provider was first added to Continued Care and Services Coordination navigator section. Financial interest is determined by settings items I EAF 34017, I EAF 34018, I EAF 34019, and I EAF 34020.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DECISION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the latest instant when the service provider decided whether they would accept the patient. This value will be cleared if the status is changed to pending.

columns.name: SELECTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the latest instant when the service provider was selected. This value will be cleared if the service provider is unselected.

columns.name: ACCEPTED_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when the patient's request for this service was accepted.

columns.name: ARCHIVE_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when the patient's request for this service was archived.

columns.name: DECLINED_DTTM
columns.description: Stores by instant when the patient's request for this service was declined.

columns.name: SELECTION_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when a service was selected from the patient's request for the service.

columns.name: ENC_SPECIFIC_FAX_NUMBER
columns.description: This is the value of the case manager inputted encounter-specific fax number, and this fax number is used to contact the targeted provider during this patient encounter.

columns.name: RECOMMENDATION_ID
columns.description: The community resource recommendation record associated with this request.
